title: Combine These Language Learning Strategies for Success

media:group.media:title: Combine These Language Learning Strategies for Success
media:group.media:description:

CC subtitles available in English.

Language learning is forgiving. It allows for errors and forgetting. We slowly become better by doing mostly top down, big picture learning, but sometimes we need to look at the details. We just shouldn't expect to remember them.

0:00 What do I mean by big picture learning and nuts and bolts learning?
2:39 There is so much vocabulary to learn in Arabic.
4:05 Breaking the code of a sentence.
6:10 Skipping and skimming through language learning text.
